turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi my name is Linda and I would like to place a order for pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome, can I ask you some questions about your location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure go ahead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What is your general location that you prefer.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chicago north side.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great we have a Gino's East pizza on 162 E Superior St.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great I was interested in getting 2 large Deep Dish Pizzas

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok is there any special pizza that you have in mind.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes we would like one pizza to be the Gino's Supreme and one Diavola.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Super choice would you like that small Med Large.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you make them both large and can you have black olives on the Gino's Supreme

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes I can, would you like any beverages added to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can we have a bottle of Prosecco wine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will add that to your order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok is there anything else you would like, like dessert.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so you have 1 large Gino's Supreme with extra olives, and one large Diavola and one bottle of Prosecco Sparkling wine.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok your pizza order is complete and the pizzas will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your welcome and your receipt will be sent to your mobile phone via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Again thank you.

items.name: Ok your pizza order is complete
